DC_DummyPUSTelemetryPacket Class Reference

#include <DC_DummyPUSTelemetryPacket.h>

Inheritance diagram for DC_DummyPUSTelemetryPacket:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Dummy implementation of the PUSTelemetryPacket class useful for testing purposes.

This telemetry packet encapsulates a single and settable byte. The update service is implemented to increment the value of the byte by one (with a wrap-around to zero when the value of 255 is reached). The values of the telemetry packet attributes are initialized to:

  • The telemetry packet type is set to TEST_TM_TYPE
  • The telemetry packet subtype is set to TEST_TM_SUBTYPE
  • The telemetry packet time tag is set to TEST_TM_TIMETAG
The constants are defined in file TestConstants.h. Note that the telemetry destination does not need to be set because it is already set to a default value by the constructor of class PUSTelemetryPacket. Similarly, the APID of the process generating the telemetry data does not need to be set because it is a static field that should be set during the test set up process.
See also:
TestConstants
Author:
Alessandro Pasetti (P&P Software GmbH)
Version:
1.0

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DC_DummyPUSTelemetryPacket::DC_DummyPUSTelemetryPacket (  void   ) 
 

Instantiate a dummy PUS telemetry packet component.

The class identifier is set, and the encapsulated byte is initialized with a value of 0. The telemetry packet attributes are set as indicated in the class comment.
